1: Carnegie Mellon's Spring Carnival is three days of amusement park rides, adventures in booths, unhealthy snacks, buggy races, and more.
2: CMU has Homecoming Weekend and Reunion Weekend for alumni; Spring Carnival.
4: The annual Alumni Awards event brings alumni, students, faculty, staff and friends together to honor members of the CMU community, all of whom have made an impact on their industries, their communities, their alma mater and others' lives around the world.
5: Yes, alumni can engage with the university through a variety of online events from anywhere in the world.
6: As a current student, you have access to resources, like the online Alumni Community, professional networking on LinkedIn, events and programs hosted by the CMU Alumni Association. You can also connect with numerous networks based on your region, identity or affinity.
